DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , multi-dose , first-in-human , multicenter , two arm ( Arm A : VGX-100 alone ; Arm B : VGX-100 co-administered bevacizumab ) , open label , dose escalation study subject advance metastatic solid tumor . The study aim evaluate safety establish recommend dose VEGF-C human monoclonal antibody VGX-100 administer alone combination bevacizumab .
DOC.brief_title: Study VGX-100 Administered Alone Co-administered With Bevacizumab Adult Subjects With Advanced Solid Tumors
